name: Ninja Playground
description:
Gameplay:

The Hunter (black ninja) chases the Pray (blue ninjas)

  • 1st caught loses
  • Last caught loses
  • Anyone caught between 1st and last, turns to a Hunter
  • When everyone is a Hunter,  the next round starts with only one Hunter
  • Last ninja stading wins!

Controls: 

  • WASD or Arrows to move
